WELCH ALLYN SURETEMP® THERMOMETER ACCESSORIES

entry.title: Thermometer Probe Covers - 96/ctn, 22 ctn/cs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Covidien/Medical Supplies
Type: Thermometer Probe Cover
Price: 7.16 - 157.45 (2 variants)

COVIDIEN/MEDICAL SUPPLIES GENIUS2™ TYMPANIC THERMOMETER

Thermometer Probe Covers, 96/ctn, 22 ctn/cs (Continental US Only)

Utilizes infrared technology to derive the most accurate body temperature from the tympanic membrane. Records and analyzes up to 100 temperature measurement, and selects the highest and most accurate in less than 2 seconds. Reduces the chance of an inaccurate reading due to improper technique or patient movement. Durable tip-based sensor technology improves durability and accuracy, minimizing the need for recalibration. Small tapered tip facilitates proper alignment with the tympanic ear canal to minimize technique errors, enhance patient comfort and facilitate pediatric use. One to two second response time. Provides actual current temperature status unlike predictive devices. Shows oral, rectal, auxiliary and core or an absolute temperature reading in the ear setting, and can be customized according to hospital protocol. No contact with mucosal membranes and the no-touch probe cover application and release reduce potential of cross-contamination.

entry.title: Tech-Med Digital Thermometer Dual Scale - 1 each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dukal Corporation
Type: Digital Thermometer
Price: 4.50

A 10 second, easy to read LCD display with 200 hours battery life. Auto shuts off after 9 minutes of non use.

Digital Thermometer, Dual Scale

  • Quick 10 Second Read with easy to read large LCD display and low Battery Indication
  • Reads both Centigrade and Fahrenheit; Range: 32° – 43.9°C, 90º – 109.9º F
  • Alarm/Beeper when reading is complete
  • Battery life: 200 hours of continuous operation
  • Auto shut off after 9 minutes of non use
  • Built in memory enabling display of the previously measured value

Type: Digital Thermometer
Price: 447.78

Model 690 Electronic Thermometer, Oral Probe, Oral Probe Well, 2-Year Limited Warranty (US Only)

Features

  • Easy to use with intuitive operation, reduces the risk of cross-contamination with removable probe well and provides more reliable readings with improved accuracy.
  • Takes approximately 4-to-6 second oral temperatures, 10-second axillary and rectal temperatures and 15-second adult axillary temperatures.
  • Has last temperature recall capability
  • Waterproof, stainless steel probe shaft
  • Color-coded, interchangeable and removable probe will minimize the risk of cross-contamination

entry.title: Memory-Loc™ Datalogging Traceable® Hygrometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Traceable® Products
Type: Hygrometer
Price: 240.00

Traceable® Memory-Loc™ Datalogging Humidity/Thermometer

The perfect unit for hoods, storerooms, cleanrooms, incubators, drying and environmental chambers

  • Fixed memory structure, maintains 688,086 humidity and temperature observations
  • Smart-Alarm™ features a visual/audible alarm that continues to alarm even if the unit returns to non-alarm conditions
  • Stores up to 30 unique alarm events
  • Memory can NOT be cleared on unit after downloading data to USB stick
  • Hassle-free retrieval of data - unit can remain in use while downloading and analyzing data
  • Status indicators - Low battery, memory full, USB data transfer and active alarm state

 

Hi/Lo Alarms and Time/Date Stamps

HI/LO alarms can be set for relative humidity and temperature. Alarm tracking feature stores in memory each alarm event detailing when the alarm state occurred, as well as when the unit returned back to within range. Alarm state indicators include audio alerts and flashing LCD segments. Data for up to 30 different alarm events can be retrieved with the most current event viewable on display.

Smart-Alarm™ signals out-of-range conditions

When an out-of-range condition is sensed, the Smart-Alarm™ triggers. Smart-Alarm™ features visual and audible indicators which signal continuously until acknowledged, even if conditions return to non-alarm range.

Memory-Loc™ Features

Monitor readings overnight, on weekends, or for any time period with rolling data log. User-defined datalogging interval of one observation/minute to one observation/12 hours. Memory capacity maintains 2 years of recorded data when using 2 minute intervals and longer when using larger intervals. No software is needed for computer interface. Each device has a unique ID allowing multiple units to be used in the same location. Recorded data in a CSV format can be transferred from the hygrometer to any computer using a USB flash drive. The data on each unit cannot be overwritten or modified, thus reliably securing information that should not be deleted.

Measuring Ranges

High-accuracy ambient and external probe relative humidity range: 0 to 95%RH, non-condensing and resolution of 0.1% and maintains an accuracy of ±3% RH between 5 to 75%, otherwise ±5% RH. Ambient temperature range: 32 to 145°F (0 to 65°C) and external probe temperature range: –4.0 to 158.0°F (–20.0 to 70.0°C) and resolution of 0.1° and maintains an accuracy of ±0.4°C across entire temperature range for both ambient and external probe.

Traceable® Certificate

Multi-point calibration on an individually-numbered Traceable® Certificate which assures accuracy from our ISO/IEC 17025:2005 (1750.01) calibration laboratory accredited by A2LA.  It indicates traceability of measurements to the SI units through NIST or other recognized national measurement institutes (NMI) that are signatories to the CIPM Mutual Recognition Agreement. High-impact, chemical-resistant ABS plastic case is 5-1/2 x 3-1/4 x 1 inches. Weight is 6 ounces. Supplied: probe, stand, Velcro®, magnetic backing, wall mount, Traceable® Certificate, and batteries. Replacement battery Cat. No. 1105.

 

RH Range 0% to 95%RH, non-condensing
RH Resolution 0.1% RH
RH Accuracy ±3% RH between 5 to 75%, otherwise ±5% RH
Temperature Range 0 to 65°C
Probe Temperature Range –20 to 70°C
Temperature Resolution 0.1°C
Temperature Accuracy ±0.4°C
Cable Length 6'

entry.title: TraceableLIVE® Ambient Datalogging Hygrometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Traceable® Products
Type: Hygrometer
Price: 275.00 - 290.00 (2 variants)

 WIRELESS HUMIDITY/TEMPERATURE MONITORING

WiFi Datalogger Ambient Monitoring Hygrometer/Thermometer with Remote Notification

REQUIRES TRACEABLELIVE® SUBSCRIPTION

FEATURES

  • Monitor remotely humidity and temperature—connect to existing WiFi
  • Alerts: humidity alarm, connectivity interruption, low battery
  • Cloud-based data interface—no local software required; web, Android, Apple IOS data visibility
  • Continuous data transmission and monitoring using SSL encrypted SECURE connection
  • Receive MOBILE PUSH / E-MAIL / TEXT notifications
  • Unlimited scalability—use TraceableLIVE® in individual labs or an entire network of facilities
  • Multiple point calibration traceable to NIST

TRACEABLE® CERTIFICATE

Multi-point calibration on an individually-numbered Traceable® Certificate which assures accuracy from an ISO/IEC 17025:2005 (1750.01) calibration laboratory accredited by A2LA. It indicates traceability of measurements to the SI units through NIST or other recognized national measurement institutes (NMI) that are signatories to the CIPM Mutual Recognition Agreement.

SUPPLIED WITH

1 Probe of your choice (choose above), Quick Start Guide, batteries, magnets, Velcro, wall mount, and Traceable® Certificate.

Temperature Range 0.00 to 55.00°C (32.00 to 131.00°F)
Temperature Resolution 0.01°
Temperature Accuracy ±0.4°C
RH Range 0.0 to 100%RH (non-condensing)
RH Accuracy ±3% RH (20 to 80% RH), ±5% RH otherwise
RH Resolution 0.1
Cable Length Remove Sensor : 6'

entry.title: Traceable® Excursion-Trac™ Datalogging Hygrometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Traceable® Products
Type: Hygrometer
Price: 225.00

Traceable® Excursion-Trac™ Datalogging Humidity/Thermometer

Perfect for hoods, storerooms, cleanrooms and other environments that need to be monitored

The perfect unit for hoods, storerooms, cleanrooms, incubators, drying and environmental chambers

  • Rolling memory structure, maintains 525,504 humidity and temperature observations
  • Smart-Alarm™ features a visual/audible alarm that continues to alarm even if the unit returns to non-alarm conditions
  • Stores up to 30 unique alarm events
  • Memory can be cleared on unit after downloading data to USB stick
  • Hassle-free retrieval of data - unit can remain in use while downloading and analyzing data
  • Status indicators - Low battery, memory full, USB data transfer and active alarm state

Hi/Lo Alarms and Time/Date Stamps

HI/LO alarms can be set for relative humidity and temperature. Alarm tracking feature stores in memory each alarm event detailing when the alarm state occurred, as well as when the unit returned back to within range. Alarm state indicators include audio alerts and flashing LCD segments. Data for up to 30 different alarm events can be retrieved with the most current event viewable on display.

Smart-Alarm™ signals out-of-range conditions

When an out-of-range condition is sensed, the Smart-Alarm™ triggers. Smart-Alarm™ features visual and audible indicators which signal continuously until acknowledged, even if conditions return to non-alarm range.

Excursion-Trac™ Features

Monitor readings overnight, on weekends, or for any time period with rolling data log. User-defined datalogging interval of one observation/minute to one observation/12 hours. Memory capacity maintains 2 years of recorded data when using 2 minute intervals and longer when using larger intervals. No software is needed for computer interface. Each device has a unique ID allowing multiple units to be used in the same location. This device provides recorded data in a CSV format that can be transferred from the hygrometer to any computer with use of a USB flash drive. No specific software is needed for the device and data can be deleted from memory.

Measuring Ranges

High-accuracy ambient and external probe relative humidity range: 0 to 95%RH, non-condensing and resolution of 0.1% and maintains an accuracy of ±3% RH between 5 to 75%, otherwise ±5% RH. Ambient temperature range: 32 to 145°F (0 to 65°C) and external probe temperature range: –4.0 to 158.0°F (–20.0 to 70.0°C) and resolution of 0.1° and maintains an accuracy of ±0.4°C across entire temperature range for both ambient and external probe.

Traceable® Certificate

Multi-point calibration on an individually-numbered Traceable® Certificate which assures accuracy from our ISO/IEC 17025:2005 (1750.01) calibration laboratory accredited by A2LA.  It indicates traceability of measurements to the SI units through NIST or other recognized national measurement institutes (NMI) that are signatories to the CIPM Mutual Recognition Agreement. High-impact, chemical-resistant ABS plastic case is 5-1/2 x 3-1/4 x 1 inches. Weight is 6 ounces. Supplied: probe, stand, Velcro®, magnetic backing, wall mount, Traceable® Certificate, and batteries. Replacement battery Cat. No. 1105.

RH Accuracy ±3% RH between 5 to 75%, otherwise ±5% RH
